thread.title: Louis Theroux will examine Donald Trump hysteria in his next series | Metro News
thread.title_full: Louis Theroux will examine Donald Trump hysteria in his next series | Metro News

author: Olivia Waring For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Louis Theroux will examine Donald Trump hysteria in his next series | Metro News
text:
Olivia Waring for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 3:17 pm Louis Theroux is going to dive into the deep, murky and probably orange sea of Trump supporters (Pictures: Getty) 
Louis Theroux has revealed the subject of his next TV series will be the Donald Trump ‘phenomenon’. 
Like many of us Brits, the documentarian is fascinated by the ‘post-Brexit wave of populism’ that seems to have facilitated Trump’s ascendancy to the White House. 
And it sounds like Louis plans to explore the origin of Trump’s ‘foibles’ — ie, the things that make him so damn weird, vain, insecure and orange. 
This ‘amazing challenge’ of Louis’ will be part of an upcoming three-part series for BBC Two, filmed in America, which he sounds pretty excited about. 
He told The Mirror : ‘It feels like a whole cultural, almost sea change in how the world is part of the post-Brexit wave of populism.
